name: year of the bunny
description:
Happy 2023, BeanBunny! I hope it's a good one for you! Collect as many sewing supplies as your heart pleases. Cheers and see you around the WG Server!

This is a clone of Google Chrome's Dinosaur game made to be way more forgiving - it doesn't speed up and you can play the game as long as you want and take as many hits as long as your score doesn't go in the negatives.

Put together in just over 60 minutes! I wanted to put a lizard in there somehow because I also really love them but I couldn't figure that out 😅 (please forgive me that you can't do much hahahaha sorry if there's bugs, try refreshing ;uwu;)

(lil easter eggy: each crafting item collected adds +17 to the score... the numbers that 2023 is divisible by are 1, 7, 17, 119, 289, and 2023. so if you score enough times you can achieve a score of a cool 2023!) ... and also the maroon i used is pantone's 2023 color of the year! hehehe

Art assets from Canva, sounds by benjaminflack and SDLx on freesound, spaghetti code is mine ;3c
